name: My Holiday Marketing
overview:
My Favourite Holiday Marketing is a new type of holiday marketing company providing services that help owners of holiday properties rent more weeks at less cost.

By providing services such as first class web design, search engine optimisation, online marketing and portal sites for holiday property owners we can help owners to secure more bookings at less cost than standard commission rates applied by agencies.
